SELECT TMM.MN_NAME FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_MANAGER TPR LEFT JOIN S_MENU_MANAGER TMM ON TPR.TPS_MN_KEYNO = TMM.MN_KEYNO WHERE TPR.TPS_MN_KEYNO = #{TPS_MN_KEYNO} GROUP BY TMM.MN_NAME

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TPR.TPS_SCORE_NAME ORDER BY TPS_KEYNO) AS RN , TPR.* , TMM.MN_NAME FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_MANAGER TPR LEFT JOIN S_MENU_MANAGER TMM ON TPR.TPS_MN_KEYNO = TMM.MN_KEYNO
WHERE TPS_MN_KEYNO = #{TPS_MN_KEYNO} ORDER BY TPS_SCORE DESC ) A WHERE RN = 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(PRS.PRS_REGDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PRS_REGDT ,TO_CHAR(PRS.PRS_MODDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PRS_MODDT , NVL(U.UI_REP_NAME,PRS_REGNM) PRS_REGNM , NVL(U2.UI_REP_NAME,PRS_MODNM) PRS_MODNM ,PRS.* FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN PRS LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO U ON PRS.PRS_REGNM = U.UI_ID LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO U2 ON PRS.PRS_MODNM = U2.UI_ID WHERE PRS_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND PRS_KEYNO = #{PRS_KEYNO}

SELECT PRS_KEYNO, PRS_FORM, PRS_SUBJECT, 'FORM'||TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PRS_KEYNO,-10)) FORM_NAME FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN WHERE PRS_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.PRSH_STDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PRSH_STDT_B , TO_CHAR(A.PRSH_ENDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PRSH_ENDT_B , NVL(U.UI_REP_NAME,PRSH_MODNM) PRSH_MODNM , A.* FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO U ON A.PRSH_MODNM = U.UI_ID WHERE PRSH_PRS_KEYNO = #{PRS_KEYNO} AND PRSH_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRSH_ENDT DESC
SELECT CASE WHEN PRS_MODDT IS NULL THEN PRS_REGDT ELSE PRS_MODDT END REGDT FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN WHERE PRS_KEYNO = #{PRS_KEYNO} AND PRS_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT PRS_FORM FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN WHERE PRS_KEYNO = #{PRS_KEYNO} UNION ALL
( SELECT PRSH_DATA PRS_FORM FROM ( SELECT PRSH_DATA ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRSH_STDT DESC) AS SS FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN_HISTORY WHERE PRSH_PRS_KEYNO = ( SELECT PRSH_PRS_KEYNO FROM T_PAGE_RESEARCH_SKIN_HISTORY WHERE PRSH_KEYNO = #{PRSH_KEYNO} ) AND PRSH_DEL_YN = 'N' AND PRSH_KEYNO <= #{PRSH_KEYNO} ORDER BY PRSH_ENDT DESC ) WHERE SS <= 2 )
SELECT LISTAGG(M.MN_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY M.MN_NAME) PRS_HP FROM S_HOME_MANAGER LEFT JOIN S_MENU_MANAGER M ON HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = M.MN_KEYNO WHERE HM_RESEARCH_SKIN = #{PRS_KEYNO}
